General.Name: Mega Or
General.Description: Mega Or Holdings Ltd engages in the initiation, construction, purchase, rental, improvement, management, and maintenance of properties in Israel. Its assets include management and logistics centers and shopping centers, as well as centers for initiation and development. The company was formerly known as Zahi Nahmias Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to Mega Or Holdings Ltd in May 2006. Mega Or Holdings Ltd was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Hevel Modi'in, Israel.
